titleStmt.title: A reply to the ansvver of the Catholiqve apology, or, A cleere vindication of the Catholiques of England from all matter of fact charg'd against them by their enemyes
titleStmt.author: Castlemaine, Roger Palmer, Earl of, 1634-1705.
Pugh, Robert, 1609-1679.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Roger Palmer, Earl of Castlemaine by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints; also attributed to Robert Pugh.
"...The humble apology of the English Catholicks ...": p. 24-41.
"A catologve [sic] of those Catholicks that died and svffered for theire loyalty": p. 175 [i.e. 275]-288.
Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
